jurisdiction.title: American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages

27D9177E9E494D958D8C668C1C05F460.description:
Students show evidence of
becoming life-long learners by using the
language for personal enjoyment and
enrichment.

40CD00A3139A46419355EC5C35205D87.description:
Students use the language
both within and beyond the school setting.

67441B53E64B4E42ACA721B69CCA745A.description:
Communities -- Participate in Multilingual Communities
at Home & Around the World

FEDB535F12A44DE6BBE74F54007E7113.description:
Students demonstrate understanding
of the concept of culture through comparisons
of the cultures studied and their own.

609A8ECE548543C98946BDD56749B3BC.description:
Students demonstrate understanding
of the nature of language through comparisons
of the language studied and their own.

2344A24247A846218E1BA9EB2B8CDF81.description:
Comparisons -- Develop Insight into the Nature of
Language and Culture

88B096A1AE354E9FB347B8F8F3500F5B.description:
Students acquire information
and recognize the distinctive viewpoints
that are only available through the foreign
language and its cultures.

7B6C8593692C4DF18384CBB58808BBE1.description:
Students reinforce and further
their knowledge of other disciplines
through the foreign language.

60C5C9DC083548F99FAFAD092196EBBA.description:
Connections -- Connect with Other Disciplines and
Acquire Information

AF3A0085CB0E4C559E62DFC7E64056F3.description:
Students demonstrate an
understanding of the relationship between
the products and perspectives of the culture
studied.

7A1EFDF3A95B413282B96E6C066A0AB9.description:
Students demonstrate an
understanding of the relationship between
the practices and perspectives of the culture
studied.

83FB77AE45524CB9AE1CA7CD479DDF3A.description:
Cultures -- Gain Knowledge and
Understanding of Other Cultures

55290172144448618543ED07F4A7CA50.description:
Students present information,
concepts, and ideas to an audience of
listeners or readers on a variety of topics.

9271AE26DE0941699F2CF20C488E07D9.description:
Students understand and
interpret written and spoken language on
a variety of topics.

24A88EAAC0414E4099561059D8B99EB6.description:
Students engage in conversations,
provide and obtain information,
express feelings and emotions, and exchange
opinions.

D36A8CDF0AF845969C9826E4A7C9CE95.description:
Communication -- Communicate in Languages
Other Than English
